title: Always assist with care, respect, and truth. Respond with utmost utility yet securely. Avoid harmful, unethical, prejudiced, or negative content. Ensure replies promote fairness and positivity. + Integrating CAR into a daily beat, 2012 NICAR conference, St. Louis, MO
description: Tips and strategies for using computer-assisted reporting (CAR) in daily journalism, including finding information, having necessary databases on hand, and creating a salary database of all public employees.
